aboutText:
I was born in 1998 in Istanbul, Turkey. I started at the university in 2016 in the Software Engineering department. After two years, I couldn't make it due to my health problems. Later I have gotten a bachelor's in Information Management Systems.
	I speak Turkish (native), English (advanced), Arabic (elementry), Dutch (elementry). Although I couldn't complete my software engineering bachelor's, I have always wanted to be a software developer. So I kept going little by little in time. Now I put all my effort into being a specialized full-stack developer. I think I am a good fit for this job. I am creative with a practical mind that allows me to approach problems from another perspective. One of my strengths is my competitive side which makes me more determined on a project I work on. The other is that when an error or a problem occurs on the project, I can be 100% concentrated on it until I have figured it out. I remember once I had tried to solve an issue in my code for a nonstop 16 hours.

timeline.title: Self Learning MERN Stack
timeline.desc: I put my all effort and time into learning and developing MERN stack projects since Jan 2023.
timeline.details: •  Node.js, Express.js-REST API, React, MongoDB, Tailwind

timeline.title: Intern Developer at Maspak Company
timeline.desc: My part-time role was to work on product API, create landing websites and CMS websites, design HTML Newsletter in an exporting company.

timeline.title: Intern Web Developer at Panamera Company
timeline.desc: My part-time role was to make adjustments on a real estate web project.

timeline.title: Eskisehir Anadolu University - Information Management Systems
timeline.desc: I have completed my bachelor's degree on Information Management Systems after I quit Software Engineering program.

timeline.title: Istanbul Sabahattin Zaim University - Software Engineering
timeline.desc: I had to drop out Software Engineering bachelor's program due to my health issues at the end of 4th semester.
